quest.name: By the Sweat of Your Brow
journal: Forgemaster Brithael has important news he would like to share with you.

It appears Faezahr has made progress towards securing new contracts for the guild, largely thanks to the samples you supplied. After congratulating himself on a job well done, Brithael assigns you your next task. Not only must you craft him an iron cross-pein hammer, but you must also attach a single materia to it. Should your knowledge of materia be lacking, he suggests you consult the goblin Mutamix in central Thanalan. Prepare the requested item and deliver it to the forgemaster.

Brithael has nothing but the highest praise for your hammer, confessing that he covets the tool for his own use. He goes on to suggest that your talents might prove key to promoting the guild's services to a wider audience─though what that would entail remains a subject for another day.

※The next blacksmith quest will be available from Brithael upon reaching level 25.
objectives: Deliver a materia-enhanced iron cross-pein hammer to Brithael.

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: Jus' the lasslad I was hopin' to see. Yer a bleedin' godssend, ye know that?

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: Ye'll be happy to hear that the treefolk were mightily impressed with them samples ye made fer that son of a whore.

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: Heh! Even the shrew had to admit I'd done a good job!

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: But who gives a damn about business, eh? Yer here to smith, am I right!? So be a good lasslad an' whip us up an iron cross-pein hammer, will ye?

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: Oh, before ye run off, I should prob'ly mention that Smydhaemr ain't sellin' iron at present. Grand Company contracts take priority, see, an' the shipwrights need all the stock we can lay our hands on.

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: So ye'll have to get the iron on yer own, be it by minin' or buyin'. I'd sooner go to Hawkers' Alley, meself, but then it ain't my coin.

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: An' one more thing─I don't want jus' any iron cross-pein hammer, lasslad. I want one melded with materia.

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: Ye know what materia is, don't ye? It's like, er...say I'd got an apron I'd been usin' fer years an' years, an' it'd got all soaked through with sweat, but instead o' just sweat, it'd taken up a bit o' me, er...spiritual essence, or somethin'...

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: Well, that essence can be pulled out an' turned into stuff called “materia,” which is like a sort o' crystal that ye can attach to gear to make it stronger an' so on.

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: Needless to say, I don't know how materia works, but there's s'posed to be a gobbie who does. Name's Mutamix if memory serves, an' he's got a camp out in Thanalan. Track him down if ye need some proper guidance.

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: Got that hammer fer me yet? Don't forget that she needs a piece o' materia stuck to her as well. Any kind'll do, by the way─don't have to be from an apron.

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: Damn fine work as always, lasslad!

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: She's got good heft, this one─the kind ye jus' don't get with bronze. Ye'd tire quicker, o' course, but that's a failin' o' the arm, not the tool.

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: An' even after ye'd worked up a sweat, I reckon her cotton-wrapped grip would keep her firmly in yer hand, where she belongs. Ahhh...

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: It's common fer smitties to make their own tools, ye know. There's no better way o' gettin' jus' what ye want, see─assumin' yer half-decent.

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: I fer one have always made me own... Bugger me, though...I'm startin' to wish I'd asked ye fer two o' these so I could keep one fer meself!

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: Heh...ye really should let me buy you a drink sometime, lasslad.

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: Ye've done a lot fer me, an' I don't want ye to think me ungrateful. In fact, I'm wonderin' if we oughtn't to put yer skills on display more prominently─really show our potential customers what the guild has to offer.

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: No need to fret about that fer the time bein', though. You jus' keep hammerin' away, all right?

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: Take it from me, lasslad: ye'll do yer best work when yer only concerns are the hammer in yer hand an' the vision in yer head. Byregot's blessin's be upon ye.
